idea-plugin.name: Plug-in DevKit Helper
idea-plugin.description:
IDEA Plugin DevKit Helper

Provides some helper feature on IDEA Plugin DevKit. The 1.0 only provides a small function that when you editing plugin.xml, the HTML content in description and change-notes will be treated as HTML so syntax highlighting and tag completion will work.

Chinese Description

给插件开发所使用的IDEA Plugin DevKit提供一些辅助功能. 1.0版目前只提供了一个小功能, 当修改plugin.xml时,将description 和 change-notes 中的 HTML 字符串内容解析为 HTML 语言, 这样就可以使用语法高亮和标签辅助以及分割编辑功能了.

Made with ❤️by BeanSoft for IDEA Plugin developers.

🆕FYI React Native Console | PsiViewer Copyable which is also developed by me.
